title: Trump pardons criminals with MAGA credentials or big money
summary: Trump has continued his first term tradition of pardoning political loyalists early in his second term—now also extending clemency to rich individuals who can exchange pardons for personal or political gifts
description: Trump has continued his first term tradition of pardoning political loyalists early in his second term—now also extending clemency to rich individuals who can exchange pardons for personal or political gifts
